recipe.title: Paleo Chocolate Mousse Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 12 oz ; coconut cream, additive/BPA-free organic, refrigerated overnight ; (360 g)
4 oz ; all natural coconut milk ; (120 mL)
â…“ cup ; unprocessed organic honey ; (120 g)

steps.step: In a small microwave-safe bowl, microwave chocolate on medium-high heat in 30-second intervals, stirring in between, until chocolate is melted. Let cool.
In a medium-size bowl, add the coconut cream, coconut milk, honey, and vanilla. Whisk until incorporated.
Divide evenly among ramekins. Refrigerate for 1 hour.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a small microwave-safe bowl, microwave chocolate on medium-high heat in 30-second intervals, stirring in between, until chocolate is melted.
In a medium-size bowl, add the coconut cream, coconut milk, honey, and vanilla.
